fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.PMAttachDocRecChair"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var docs=[];\\nguideBridge.getFileAttachmentsInfo({\\n success:function(list) {\\n for(var i=0; i<list.length;i++){\\n if(list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\").length>2){\\n var splitString = list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\");\\n var splitStringNeeded = splitString[0].split(\\"/\\"\,5);\\n var splitStringFinal = splitStringNeeded.join('/');\\n var finalString = splitString.join(\\".pdf\,\\"+splitStringFinal+\\"/\\").split(\\"\,\\");\\n var lastEle = finalString.pop();\\n for(var path in finalString){\\n //console.log(path);\\n if(finalString[path].includes(\\"PMAttachDocRecChair\\")){\\n \\tdocs.push(finalString[path].replace(/\\\\n/g\,''));\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n else{\\n if(list[i].path.includes(\\"PMAttachDocRecChair\\")){\\n docs.push(list[i].path);\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n PMFilePathRecChair.value = docs;\\n }\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

PMAttendPanel.instanceManager.instanceCount;i++){\\n var checkbool = Attendist[i].PMAttendName.value!==null || Attendist[i].PMAttendJobTitle.value!==null || Attendist[i].PMAttendCheck.value!==null;\\n eachAttend.attendType=Attendist[i].PMAttendCheck.value;\\n AttendListArr.push(eachAttend);\\n }\\n }\\n jsonData.AttendDetails=AttendListArr;\\n jsonData.FilePaths=PMFilePathRecChair.value;\\n jsonData.userID=userID.value;\\n jsonData.HostPath=window.location.protocol+\\"//\\"+window.location.hostname+\\":\\"+window.location.port;\\n url = 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/InsertPMChairAdvRecord';\\n xmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\n $.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n PMIDNo.value=data;\\n PMIDNoValue.value=\\"
